# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(OpenGLGalaxySim LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(OpenGLGalaxySim "")
set_target_properties(OpenGLGalaxySim PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "OpenGLGalaxySim")
set_target_properties(OpenGLGalaxySim PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
target_include_directories(OpenGLGalaxySim PRIVATE
    dep/imgui
    dep/stb_image
    src
    include
)
target_include_directories(OpenGLGalaxySim SYSTEM PRIVATE
    D:/msys64/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/include
    D:/msys64/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/include
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(OpenGLGalaxySim PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(Clang)
    target_compile_options(OpenGLGalaxySim PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(OpenGLGalaxySim PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(Gcc)
    target_compile_options(OpenGLGalaxySim PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(OpenGLGalaxySim PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(OpenGLGalaxySim PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(OpenGLGalaxySim PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(OpenGLGalaxySim PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET OpenGLGalaxySim PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(OpenGLGalaxySim PRIVATE
    glfw3
    shell32
    gdi32
    glm
)
target_link_directories(OpenGLGalaxySim PRIVATE
    D:/msys64/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/lib
    D:/msys64/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/lib
)
target_sources(OpenGLGalaxySim PRIVATE
    src/Application.cpp
    src/IndexBuffer.cpp
    src/Renderer.cpp
    src/shader.cpp
    src/Texture.cpp
    src/VertexArray.cpp
    src/VertexBuffer.cpp
    src/camera/Camera.cpp
    src/camera/FreeCamera.cpp
    src/camera/Screen.cpp
    src/gravity/planet.cpp
    src/gravity/stellar.cpp
    src/item/Cube.cpp
    src/item/Item.cpp
    src/item/Shpere.cpp
    src/item/Skybox.cpp
    src/item/SpotLight.cpp
    dep/imgui/imgui.cpp
    dep/imgui/imgui_demo.cpp
    dep/imgui/imgui_draw.cpp
    dep/imgui/imgui_impl_glfw.cpp
    dep/imgui/imgui_impl_opengl3.cpp
    dep/imgui/imgui_tables.cpp
    dep/imgui/imgui_widgets.cpp
    dep/stb_image/stb_image.cpp
    src/glad.c
)
